title: Spider-Verse, DC Blue Beetle, Marvel Secret Invasion Live Trailer Reaction Kinda Funny
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to https://www.evildeadrisemovie.com/ to get your tickets NOW to see Evil Dead Rise in theaters April 21.

We react to the latest Spider-Man Across The Spider-Verse, Marvel's Secret Invasion, and DC's Blue Beetle trailers.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:41 - Spider-Verse
00:15:50 - Blue Beetle
00:31:41 - Secret Invasion
